title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, develop and maintain software applications, write clean, reusable, and maintainable code, identify and fix issues
educational_requirements: BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field or equivalent practical experience

title: Data Scientist
description: Build and maintain data pipelines and infrastructure
responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, build and maintain data pipelines and infrastructure, write clean, efficient, and well-documented code, identify and fix issues
educational_requirements: BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field or equivalent practical experience

title: Mechanical Engineer
description: Develop and maintain software applications for Tesla's autonomous driving system
responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, develop and maintain software applications, write clean, efficient, and well-documented code, identify and fix issues
educational_requirements: BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field or equivalent practical experience

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design and implement cloud solutions for enterprise customers
responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, design and implement cloud solutions, conduct assessments and audits, identify and fix issues
educational_requirements: BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field or equivalent practical experience

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Develop and maintain software applications for clients
responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, develop and maintain software applications, write clean, efficient, and well-documented code, identify and fix issues
educational_requirements: BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field or equivalent practical experience

title: Product Manager
description: Drive the development of Facebook's products and services
responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, drive the development of Facebook's products and services, conduct market research and analysis, communicate with stakeholders
educational_requirements: BS/MS degree in Business Administration or related field or equivalent practical experience
